system.description: At 2nd level, a drow is able to cast the @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.jaSob2YvtAI7KTjR]{darkness} spell (the reverse of light) once per day and, at 4th level, @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.vRtoWnlxiF0x74cK]{detect magic} once per day (see @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.EUNZ2PDKp7Amu7CX.JournalEntryPage.iW0YUQNIRaYo5ecH]{Cleric Spell List}).
